mapper.sql: id, user_id, column_id, status, create_time, update_time
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO column_subscription (user_id, column_id, status, create_time, update_time) VALUES (#{userId}, #{columnId}, #{status}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime})
mapper.select: SELECT c.id, c.user_id, c.name, c.description, c.cover_url, c.status, c.post_count, c.subscribe_count, c.is_recommended, c.sort, c.last_post_time, c.create_time, c.update_time FROM `column` c INNER JOIN column_subscription cs ON c.id = cs.column_id WHERE cs.user_id = #{userId} AND cs.status = 1 AND c.status = 1 ORDER BY cs.create_time DESC LIMIT #{offset}, #{limit}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM column_subscription cs INNER JOIN `column` c ON cs.column_id = c.id WHERE cs.user_id = #{userId} AND cs.status = 1 AND c.status = 1
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM column_subscription WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND column_id = #{columnId} AND status = 1
